experienceOne.description: I have been developing software and IoT technologies since the start of my Excellence Scholarship: STEAM Technology, where I have utilized CircuitPython to achieve various objectives, such as controlling robots and enabling communication between different devices. I have worked on projects that include creating dashboards to display sensor data and designing web pages with iconographic interfaces for robot control.

experienceTwo.description: As part of a team of 3 developers, I contributed to the design and development of an innovative system for the comprehensive evaluation of projects at the “Olimpiadas de Computación Inteligente”. The system, used by 9 judges and several administrative entities, allows the registration and tracking of users, dimensions, tournaments, projects and evaluations. It reduce times to 1 hour and half to 40 minutes.

experienceThree.description: I installed and maintained computer equipment, diagnosed technical issues, and promptly resolved user problems. Additionally, I managed inventories, adhered to company policies, and efficiently used ticketing systems for communication between users and technical support.
